text: 6000 afọ mmadụ akụkọ ihe mere eme visualized
Oge nke ihe a kpọrọ mmadụ

notes: timespan, age (Adam was 130 years old when Shem was born)
years when used as age for a person (different word than years in some languages)
if the word "year" appears after the numeral, like "at the age of 35 years"
first king of southern kingdom of Juda
For 3 years Jeoahaz and Jeoash reigned together
reign only recorded 6 months, probably only established 792 BCE

text: Israel nọ n'ọhịa 1513 ruo 1473 T.O.A. - afọ 40
english: Israel in the wilderness 1513 to 1473 B.C.E. – 40 years

text: 479 afọ ruo mgbe ụlọ nsọ na-ewu - 1 Ndị Eze 6:1
english: 479 years until the temple construction – 1 Kings 6:1

text: Jizọs mere baptizim n'oge mgbụsị akwụkwọ 29 O.A.
Afọ 3.5 nke ozi Jizọs, gburu Nisan 14th, 33 O.A.
english: 3.5 years of Jesus service, executed Nisan 14th, 33 C.E.

text: Ugboro 7 - afọ 2520 ruo Alaeze Mesaya 1914 O.A. (Daniel 4:23)
english: 7 times – 2520 years to the Messianic Kingdom 1914 C.E. (Daniel 4:23)

text: Agha Afọ Iri Atọ na Europe 1618-1648
Njem Ozi Ala Ọzọ mbụ nke Pọl, ihe dị ka 47-48 OA na Banabas na Jọn Mak
english: First Missionary Journey of Paul, c. 47-48 C.E. with Barnabas and John Mark

text: Okwu ibi úgwù n'Antiọk, nzukọ dị na Jeruselem ihe dị ka afọ 49 O.A.
english: Circumcision issue at Antioch, conference in Jerusalem c. 49 C.E.

text: Njem Ozi Ala Ọzọ nke Abụọ c. 49-52 OA na Silas (Silvanus)
english: Second Missionary Journey c. 49-52 C.E with Silas (Silvanus)

text: Njem Ozi Ala Ọzọ nke Atọ c. 52-56 O.A.
Pọl nọ n'ụlọ mkpọrọ na Sesaria c. 56-58 O.A.
english: Paul in custody in Caesarea c. 56-58 C.E.

text: A tụọ Pọl mkpọrọ mbụ na Rom 59-61 O.A.
english: Paul’s first imprisonment in Rome c. 59-61 C.E.

text: Mkpọrọ nke abụọ Pọl na Rom 65 OA, 2 Timoti dere, Pọl gburu
english: Paul’s second imprisonment in Rome c. 65 CE, 2 Timothy written, Paul executed

text: Galba, Otho na Vitellius (Afọ nke Eze Ukwu Anọ)
english: Galba, Otho and Vitellius (Year of the Four Emperors)

text: Ọpụpụ site n'Ijipt na Nisan 14th, 1513 T.O.A.
english: Exodus from Egypt on Nisan 14th, 1513 B.C.E.

text: Mbibi nke Sameria 740 T.O.A. nke Asiria
notes: Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria
english: Destruction of Samaria 740 B.C.E. by Assyria

text: Mbibi nke Jerusalem 607 T.O.A. site na Babilọn, afọ 390 mgbe nkewa nke alaeze ahụ gasịrị (Ezikiel 4: 5)
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 607 B.C.E. by Babylon, 390 years after the division of the kingdom (Ezekiel 4:5)

text: E wughachiri ụlọ nsọ dị na Jeruselem n'afọ 515 T.O.A.
E wughachiri mgbidi Jeruselem n'afọ 455 T.O.A.
Mbibi nke Jerusalem 70 O.A. site rome n'okpuru Titus
english: Destruction of Jerusalem 70 C.E. by Rome under Titus

text: Ọgwụgwụ nke oge mba dị iche iche, alaeze Chineke malitere ịchị n'eluigwe n'afọ 1914 O.A.
english: End of the time of the nations, Gods kingdom starts to rule in heaven 1914 C.E.

text: Ọ ghọrọ eze mgbe ọ dị afọ
Vulgate dechara site Jerome (Latin translation of the Bible) c. 405 O.A.
english: Vulgate completed by Jerome (Latin translation of the bible) c. 405 C.E.

text: Ihe odide Grik nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ Grik nke Ndị Kraịst bipụtara Desiderius Erasmus nke Rotterdam 1516
english: Greek text of Christian Greek Scriptures published by Desiderius Erasmus of Rotterdam 1516

text: Nsụgharị Baịbụl Bekee nke Tyndale 1536 sụgharịrị

english: middle of week “sacrifice to cease” Daniel 9:27

text: Kọnịliọs mere baptizim ná ngwụsị izu 70 (Daniel 9:24) na 36 O.A.
english: Cornelius baptized at the end of 70 weeks (Daniel 9:24) in 36 C.E.

text: Oge njedebe nke oge tupu Columbia na America 1492
english: end of the pre-columbian period in the Americas 1492

text: Nkwupụta nke nnwere onwe nke 13 colonies na America 1776
english: declaration of independence of 13 colonies in America 1776

text: Tischendorf na-achọpụta Codex Sinaiticus site na narị afọ nke 4 na 1844
english: Tischendorf discovers the Codex Sinaiticus from the 4th century in 1844

text: Akwụkwọ Mpịakọta Oké Osimiri Nwụrụ Anwụ e dere
E bipụtara mbipụta mbụ nke "Zion's Watch Tower and Herald of Christ's Presence" na 1879
english: The first issue of “Zion’s Watch Tower and Herald of Christ’s Presence” is published in 1879

text: E gosipụtara "Photo-Drama of Creation" na New York na Jenụwarị 11, 1914
english: The “Photo-Drama of Creation” is first shown in New York on January 11, 1914

text: Ndị Mmụta Baịbụl nakweere aha ọhụrụ - Ndịàmà Jehova. Na Columbus, Ohio, 1931
english: The Bible Students adopted a new name – Jehovah’s Witnesses. In Columbus, Ohio, 1931

text: Ụlọ Akwụkwọ Gilied Nke Ụlọ Nche malitere n'ụbọchị Mọnde, Febụwarị 1, 1943
english: Watchtower Bible School of Gilead began on Monday, February 1, 1943

text: "Nsụgharị Ụwa Ọhụrụ nke Akwụkwọ Nsọ" e wepụtara na Manchester, England na June 18, 1960
english: “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released in Manchester, England on June 18, 1960

text: Akwụkwọ bụ́ "Eziokwu Nke Na-eduga ná Ndụ Ebighị Ebi" wepụtara n'afọ 1968
english: The book “The Truth That Leads to Eternal Life” released 1968

text: Mmalite nke ịgba àmà obodo ukwu na 2011
Malite JW.ORG na ntụziaka n'ozi alaeze Disemba 2012
english: Start of JW.ORG with instructions in kingdom ministry December 2012

text: Revised "New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures" wepụtara na nzukọ kwa afọ 2013
english: Revised “New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures” released at annual meeting 2013

text: Usoro ọhụrụ nke nzukọ etiti izu na "nzukọ akwụkwọ ọrụ" malite na Jenụwarị 2016
english: New format of midweek meeting with “meeting workbook” starting January 2016

text: E kere usoro iheomume a na 2023, afọ kachasị ọkụ n'akụkọ ihe mere eme nke mmadụ na afọ 125,000 gara aga
english: This timeline was created in 2023, the hottest year in human history and the last 125,000 years

text: Leningrad Codex e dere na Cairo AD 1008
english: Leningrad Codex written in Cairo AD 1008

text: Jọn dere "mkpughe" mgbe a chụgara ya n'agha na Patmọs 96-98 O.A.
english: John writes “revelation” while exiled on Patmos 96-98 C.E.
The Buddha – Siddhartha Gautama c.563-c.483 B.C.E

english: Hijrah - Journey Mecca to Medina 16 July 622

english: Presence of Christ, Conclusion of the system of things (Matt 24:3), the last days (2Ti 3:1)

notes: no text left and right – empty!

Josephus c. 37 - ihe dị ka 100 O.A.
